wikipedia_page.main: Steven Tweed (born 8 August 1972) is a Scottish former footballer and manager.Tweed started his career in Scotland with Hibernian, for whom he made over 100 league appearances. He made his first move abroad in 1996 when he joined Greek side Ionikos. Tweed then returned to the UK with Stoke City and then Dundee. He then played for German side MSV Duisburg and Japanese outfit Yokohama before returning to Scotland with Livingston, East Fife and ended his career with Montrose he was manager of Montrose for two years.

response: *  1972   – Steven Tweed, Scottish footballer and manager
* Steven Tweed (born 1972), Scottish footballer and manager
Bullock was Steven Tweed's first signing for Montrose.
